author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
Not a PSReadLine issue.  Repros if unloaded.  Most likely a corefx issue with console and terminfo.  

Steps to reproduce
------------------

```powershell
docker run -it mcr.microsoft.com/powershell:preview-alpine-3.8
get-command
```

Expected behavior
-----------------

```none
get-command
```

Actual behavior
---------------

```none
ggegetget-get-cget-coget-comget-commget-commaget-commanget-command
```

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.1.0-fixalpine
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    6.1.0-fixalpine
OS                             Linux 4.9.93-linuxkit-aufs #1 SMP Wed Jun 6 16:55:56 UTC 2018
Platform                       Unix
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0

```

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: Figured it out, needs ncurses terminfo pkg installed: `apk add ncurses-terminfo-base`

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body:
The current image is experimental and a work in progress

> 2 The size of this image is not small, 172mb.

The current way we build the image is less than optimal and may be leaving garbage behind.  We need to add PSModuleRestore support to the alpine build to avoid this.

> 3 Since the GA version of ps core 6.1 cannot support the docker module, it is expected to release the 6.04 version + alpine image.

1. The docker module is abandoned with no plans to resume work on this.  This effort was by the Microsoft container team and ran into supportability issues.
2. 6.0.4 is not capable of supporting Alpine.
